name: Dice Gun
description:
Game Description

Dice Gun is a roguelike shooter, where every shot is randomly rolled.

Play as the choosen one and wield the Dice Gun. Shoot randomly rolled projectiles, to stop the evil cult of dice.

Reach Level 31 to win the game.

Controls AbilityBindingPrimary ProjectileLMBSecondary ProjectileRMBMovementW, A, S, D Notes

This game was developed by 3 people in 48 hours during the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
